title: New Client
body:
Hey Riot, I've made a post about this before. Whenever you guys switch to the new client I won't be able to play on it, because I have a small resolution screen. I know you guys added a settings button to the client but whenever I try and drag it over it cuts of the whole friend's list and that part. I've been trying to figure out a way for it to not cut off for it to not do that, but I have been unsuccessful. Could you guys maybe consider moving the settings button or could i get some help on how to fix if, if there is one?
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

replies.body: If I understand correctly, your client is oversized.  Try tapping Ctrl + Down Arrow on your keyboard to adjust that.  Let me know if this helps!
